atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into the CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to. Valid layers are base, components, and utilities.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Specify which config file Tailwind should use when compiling that CSS file.
